name: Infinitype DEMO UPDATED!
description:
Download and Wishlist the game on Steam here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1926510/Infinitype/

Google Play Version is coming soon.

This is an updated version of the Infinitype Demo that takes feedback into account and delivers a refined monkey experience. There's a new dictionary, new tutorial and many more changes. Go for large words as usual.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SquirrelInkGame
